Texts.Chs: 愤怒。你能相信阿金^red;又她奶奶的*^reset;错过了她的轮班吗？她说她病了。你见过生病的星之子吗？
Texts.Eng: Angry. Can you believe Kim missed her shift ^red;*again*^reset;? She claims she's sick. Have you ever seen a sick Novakid?

Texts.Chs: 愤怒。我可以把咖啡豆加热到最佳温度，但管理层说我的放置方式会让客户反感。热力排液工艺有什么问题？
Texts.Eng: Angry. I can heat the beans to optimum tempature, but management says my deposit method would turn off customers. What's wrong with thermic exhaust liquid process?

Texts.Chs: 还有5分钟就关门了，他们不让我关钱柜。
Texts.Eng: Angry. It is 5 minutes till closing and they won't let me close the till.

Texts.Chs: 愤怒。啊金这个月第三次没来上班了。她可能又和那个^red;%$#@^reset;史黛西贴贴去了。
Texts.Eng: Angry. Kim didn't show up for her shift for the third time this month. She's probably with that ^red;%$#@^reset; Stacy again.

Texts.Chs: 烦人，您要点什么？
Texts.Eng: Annoyed. Can I take your order?

Texts.Chs: 烦恼。我不是天生的金色。但公司管理层坚持要我喷点油漆，以展示他们也雇佣少数族裔。人渣。
Texts.Eng: Annoyed. I am not naturally gold in color. Management insisted I get a paint job to show they also hire minorities. Scummy.

Texts.Chs: 生气。我休息的时候，凯文不停地把咖啡豆换成加布林。
Texts.Eng: Annoyed. Kevin won't stop replacing the stir sticks with garflipps when I'm on break.

Texts.Chs: 全恼。有人在我之前把量油尺插进了咖啡里。
Texts.Eng: Annoyed. Some dipstick stuck their dipstick in the coffee before I could.

Texts.Chs: 随意。我曾经像你一样是一个冒险家。知道我膝盖中了一箭。
Texts.Eng: Casual. I used to be an adventurer like you. But then I took an arrow to the knee.

Texts.Chs: 随意，让我猜猜: 有人偷了你的甜甜圈？
Texts.Eng: Casual. Let me guess: Someone stole your sweetroll?

Texts.Chs: 高兴。你觉得怎么样？平行线？弯曲？正方形？
Texts.Eng: Cheerful. How do you take it? Double-double? Bent? Square?

Texts.Chs: 好极了，我已经为你把这杯咖啡煮好了。
Texts.Eng: Cheerful. I've pre-bent this coffee for you.

Texts.Chs: 愉快。充分利用我们新推出的“双倍价格”特惠！^green;然后就按原价翻倍大放送^reset;！
Texts.Eng: Cheery. Take advantage of our new 'double the price' special! ^green;Now pay 2x the usual price^reset;!

Texts.Chs: 困惑，没有人尝试过镭泡沫。
Texts.Eng: Confused. Nobody has tried the Radium Foam option.

Texts.Chs: 困惑。我的便携式咆哮器去哪儿了？哦。嗨。你要点什么？
Texts.Eng: Confused. Wh.... wh.. where did my portable Snarsher go? Oh. Hi. What can I get you?

Texts.Chs: 困惑。你为什么要支付这些价格？老实说...我真的很好奇人们是真的这么愚蠢还是只图个方便？
Texts.Eng: Confused. Why would you want to pay these prices? Honestly...I'm truly curious if people are this stupid or if its just convenience?

Texts.Chs: 热忱。欢迎，客人！今天我能为你现磨些什么？
Texts.Eng: Cordial. Welcome, guest! What can I brew for you today?

Texts.Chs: 好奇。你和我一样是艺术生吗？
Texts.Eng: Curious. Are you an art student like me?

Texts.Chs: 好奇。曾经有过似曾相识的感觉吗？我发誓我之前为你服务过... ... 但你现在却在这里。
Texts.Eng: Curious. Ever had a feeling of Deja Vu? I swear I served you earlier...yet here you are now.

Texts.Chs: 好奇。我曾经尝试过社交润滑，但它似乎只是吓唬人。
Texts.Eng: Curious. I tried social lubrication once, but it only seemed to scare people.

Texts.Chs: 好奇。我想知道为什么我们不再接受德尔塔·弗雷亚研究基地的人的订单了？ 他们是那些玩意的*朋友*！
Texts.Eng: Curious. I wonder why we stopped getting orders from the folks at that Delta Freya research base? They were *fiends* for this stuff!

Texts.Chs: 好奇。你最喜欢的口味是什么：蔬菜？肉？自行车？我们提供各种饮食类型的食品。除了我。所以，没有自行车。司马管理。
Texts.Eng: Curious. What is your favorite flavor: Vegetable? Meat? Bike? We carry goods catered to all diet types. Except mine. So, no bikes. @%$#ing management.

Texts.Chs: 狡猾。你认为有人会注意到他们的咖啡中机油的味道吗？我感觉一场“意外”即将来临...
Texts.Eng: Devious. Do you think anyone will notice the taste of motor oil in their coffee? I feel an 'accident' coming on...

Texts.Chs: 高兴。管理层说他们会考虑我的立方咖啡概念。
Texts.Eng: Elated. Management said they would consider my cubed coffee concept.

Texts.Chs: 兴奋。一个顾客。您要点什么？........嗨。欢迎。您要点什么？...等等。我是谁？
Texts.Eng: Excited. A customer. What can I get you? ........ Hi. Welcome. Can I take your order? .... wait. Who am I?

Texts.Chs: 真高兴。我的班很快就要结束了。在那之前，你想要点什么？
Texts.Eng: Gleeful. My shift is over soon. Until then, what can I get you?

Texts.Chs: 资讯。如果你不停地强制喂食一块人肉蛋糕和咖啡大约一年，它们会增重12公斤到64公斤，这取决于它们的消耗量。
Texts.Eng: Informative. If you force-feed a human cake and coffee non-stop for approximately 1 year they will gain between 12kg and 64kg pounds depending on volume consumed.

Texts.Chs: 数学。我不得不使用直尺来把咖啡的折叠弄对。
Texts.Eng: Mathmatical. I had to use a straightedge to get the fold on the coffee right.

Texts.Chs: 紧张。你要短杯的，高杯的，大杯的，超大杯的，还是...沮丧。哦，不，我又忘了..。
Texts.Eng: Nervous. Will that be a short, a tall, a grande, a venti, or a... Frustrated. Oh no, I've lost track again...

Texts.Chs: 高价的劣质咖啡和烘焙食品。
Texts.Eng: Overpriced, crappy coffee and baked goods.

Texts.Chs: 骄傲。作为一名咖啡师，我可以有把握地说，我已经掌握了味道的艺术。我给我的最后一位顾客免费注射了一针钋糖浆。他们要求重开。
Texts.Eng: Proud. As a barista, I can safely say I have mastered the art of flavor. I gave my last customer a free shot of Polonium Syrup. They asked for a remake.

Texts.Chs: 质疑。凯文？他确实做三明治，是的。他做的麦切丁是一个嘎吱嘎吱响的梦。
Texts.Eng: Queried. Kevin? He does make the sandwiches, yes. His McChitin is a crunchy dream.

Texts.Chs: 愤怒。下一个^red;@$#@^reset;说他们通过^red;@$#@^reset;app下订单时^red;@$#@^reset;出错，真的巴不得那玩意死个马！老实说。对不起，您要点什么？
Texts.Eng: Raging. I am going to strangle the next ^red;@$#@^reset; that says their order is wrong when they placed it via the ^red;@$#@^reset; app! Honestly. Sorry, what can I get you?

Texts.Chs: 讽刺。*叹气* 我发誓要挑起你的重担.....
Texts.Eng: Sarcastic. *sigh* I'm sworn to carry your burdens...

Texts.Chs: 讽刺。美术学位是完全有效的职业选择，不会以在这里工作而告终。
Texts.Eng: Sarcastic. A degree in fine arts is perfectly valid career choice that will not end in working here.

Texts.Chs: 讽刺，我的工作薪水很高。
Texts.Eng: Sarcastic. I get paid well for the work I do.

Texts.Chs: 讽刺。我已经确认了咖啡是无虫无虫无害无害害害害^red;---- 错误恢复----^reset; 我可以为您点单吗？
Texts.Eng: Sarcastic. I've made sure the coffee is bugfreebugfreebugfree ^red;--ERROR RECOVERED--^reset; May I take your order?

Texts.Chs: 讽刺。我们的咖啡太好喝了。
Texts.Eng: Sarcastic. Our coffee is amazing.

Texts.Chs: 讽刺。在这里工作真是一种乐趣。
Texts.Eng: Sarcastic. Working here is truly a joy.

Texts.Chs: 愚蠢。想听我放腋窝屁吗？
Texts.Eng: Silly. Want to hear me make armpit farts?

Texts.Chs: 笨蛋。嗨，我在哪里？
Texts.Eng: Stupid. Hi. Where am I?

Texts.Chs: 惊讶。你真的愿意付这些价钱，中间没有我们市场部的任何鼓励？
Texts.Eng: Surprised. You are actually going to pay these prices, willingly, without any encouragement from our marketing department?

Texts.Chs: 勘测。你喝带血的肉咖啡时有没有眼睛？
Texts.Eng: Surveying. Do you take your bloody meat coffee with or without the eyes?

Texts.Chs: 异想天开。我可以创造宇宙中最伟大的咖啡艺术，只用我的量油尺。想看看吗？
Texts.Eng: Whimsical. I can create the greatest coffee art in the universe using only my dipstick. Want to see?

Texts.Chs: ^orange;星八克^white;
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Starbucks^white;

Texts.Chs: ^yellow;*恐怖的流行音乐响起*^reset;
Texts.Eng: ^yellow;*horrible trendy pop music plays*^reset;
